title: Non-aural set, D major part-writing error - m 3

content.prompt: Which of the following reorderings of measure 3 would most improve the cadential preparation, taking into account the voice leading into and out of measure 3?

choices.label: \(I^6-V-ii_5^6-I\)
\(ii_5^6-I-I^6-V\)
\(V-ii_5^6-I^6-I\)
\(I-I^6-ii_5^6-V\)

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in notated music.
